results.title: Metformin reduces hepatic resistance and portal pressure in cirrhotic rats.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Gastrointest Liver Physiol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ caused a significant reduction in @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_XII</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562718 @@@Sirius red@@@), hepatic stellate cell activation (@GENE_ACTG2 @GENE_25365 @@@alpha-smooth muscle actin@@@, @GENE_PDGFRB @GENE_24629 @@@platelet-derived growth factor receptor beta polypeptide@@@, transforming growth factor-betaR1, and Rho kinase), @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@hepatic inflammation@@@ (@GENE_CD68 @GENE_287435 @@@CD68@@@ and @GENE_CD163 @GENE_312701 @@@CD163@@@), @CHEMICAL_Superoxides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013481 @@@superoxide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_dihydroethidium @CHEMICAL_MESH:C067883 @@@dihydroethidium@@@ staining), and @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ scavenging (protein nitrotyrosination).

citations.NLM: Tripathi DM, Erice E, Lafoz E, García-Calderó H, Sarin SK, Bosch J, Gracia-Sancho J, García-Pagán JC. Metformin reduces hepatic resistance and portal pressure in cirrhotic rats. Am J Physiol Gastrointest Liver Physiol. 2015 Sep 1;309(5):G301-9. PMID: 26138461
